strings.s: You can't be so clueless...
Jesus Christ... Looks like you are...
Please... Forgive me, sir...
You'll have to come with me...
But... I... I don't...
Look... If you can't pay what you owe, then you'll have to work in order to earn the money...
But... But...
I used to be an agent to girls that need to make easy money on the streets... Just like you...
I'll find some clients for you to 'serve' so you can make the money you need to pay me...
Now... Come with me... There's no other way for you to get out of this trouble...
NO WAY!
GO WITH HIM
NO WAY!
What... What do you think I am?? I won't just...
Wrong answer...
Sigh... Why didn't you just came with me? Now I'll have to drag you around...
If... If there's no other way...
Yeah... Good choice... Come on...
Come in... I can't hear you...
_mmmmnn..._
Are you here?
Nope... Just the good old me with you, pretty girl...
What the...
Finally... It was about time for you to wake up...
Where am I?? Why am I here?? What... What happened to my clothes...
Whoa... So many questions... Easy there...
First... it doesn't matter where you are...
Second... Your clothes are right there over the shelves...
Don't worry... I didn't took any "advantage" of you...
I just wanted to make you feel more comfortable...
Finally... The reason why you're here is... to pay back what you owe me...
But I... I don't...
I still can't see straight because of that annoying flash of yours... I won't be able to work today like that...
I'm sorry... I didn't meant to...
I already took all the money you had to cover the financial loss of this day... But it wasn't enough...
My business generate a lot of revenue, and I can't just walk back to the boss with less than expected...
You should know that not paying your gambling debts is a serious crime in this country... Really serious...
I'm sorry... I didn't meant to...
Just be thankful that I won't hand you over to the authorities...
They would give you a much harsher treatment than this...
I... I have lots of money at home... If I... I could just...
Sorry... But I can't wait you ask daddy for money... And I can't risk let you leave and never come back...
So... You're going to work here today to earn the money you sill owe me...
Work? What... What do you mean...
Look around... Look at you... You're a clever girl... I'm sure you already figured it out...
This... This can't be real...
Oh... It's very real... There's no easier way for a girl to make money, right?
No... Let me go... Please... I'm sorry... I'm sorry...
Hey... Don't be sorry...
Where are you?
I... I'm not sure...
Well... It doesn't look like a friendly place...
What the hell, How can you agree to this 'serving men' thing?
Oh my God... Why do I always end up in these situations?
I'm... I'm sorry, ... I don't have a choice... I'll be thinking about us while I... I...
Hey, pretty girl... Who the hell are you talking to?
Oh... I'm just talking to myself...
Hey... Don't lose your mind now... Everything is going to be okay...
I... I'm not sure about this...
Don't worry... It's normal to be nervous during your first time 'working'...
You're actually very lucky... I thought at first you would need to 'work' here for weeks and serve a lot of 'clients' to pay your debt...
But I just got a call from a high-level official... He's been looking for a nice foreign girl and offered A LOT of money for you when I described your qualities...
So... You'll only need to see this one client and the debt your settled...
I... I'm not... I'm not a...
What? A whore? A prostitute? A hooker?
You can babble whatever you want, pretty girl... But you won't leave this room wihtout paying your debt first...
Now stay there... He is already arriving...
He likes quiet girls, so you'd better not annoy him with your constant whining...
Treat him well and you might even receive a fine tip... The bastard won loads of money in our last mission...
Don't give up,
Don't give up, You're smarter than these bastards... I know you can find a way to escape this place without submiting to them...
Oh... Thank you for staying with me, I'll try something...
You're accepting this situation quite well,
You're accepting this situation quite well,
It's because... I... I can't see a way of get out of this without... doing what he said...
STAY SILENT
Are you still with me? I don't want to be alone here...
_You can get in, sir... She's waiting..._
Oh no... Someone is coming...
Daaamn... I really hit the jackpot this time...
What are the odds of finding such fine girl like this selling herself in this country, huh?
ASK FOR HELP
Please, help me sir... That man forced me to be here... I just want to leave...
Yeah... Your boy told me you have this fantasy kink about being kidnapped and...
But... But it's not a...
Hey... I'm not into this role play shit... Just cut it out... My patience is short...
KEEP LOOKING DOWN
Oh, man... She's the silent and shy type... This can't get any better...
So... Let's know each other a little better...
Look at you... So beautiful and clean... So much better than the dirty local girls I have to resort to...
Those junkies keep bothering me... asking for another pill of 'candy'... They don't know how difficult is to bring my shipments of MDMA to sell here...
What about you? Do you want some candy? I could give you as much as you want...
SHAKE HEAD NEGATIVELY
no...
Ha... You're pure gold, girl... Do you have a boyfriend? I could definetively bring you to live with me...
Methylenodioxymethanphetamine?!
Methylenodioxymethanphetamine? It's... It's a highly addictive psychoactive substance, sir... It's very dangerous...

Anyways... Now that we know more of each other...
...we can get a little closer...
Yeah... At first I thought I paid too much for you... But, damn... This will definetively worth...

Well... Look at this... You're full of susprises aren't you, honey?
You... stay away from me... or else...
Or else what? Just put it down and let's have some fun...
You're just a frail and scared little girl...
You don't you have the guts to use this knife...
HE IS WRONG!
I'm sick of hearing your voice, you slimy bastard...
What the hell just happened?
I just showed this pig who is frail and scared...
Jesus Christ... That was the best plan you could figure?
I... I don't know... But it was my only option...
Wait a minute... I'll search him...
Damnit... His gun is empty...
But, hey...
At least he had a lot of money in his wallet... I don't think he'll need it now, right?
Sir? Is everything okay in there?
Oh, shit...
Sir? Uhh...
I don't want to disturb your fun, sir... Just reporting that the girl and the room are yours until tomorrow... I'm leaving now...

Hey... I'm back at the bus stop...
Good... Now you'd better just avoid that gambler...

He is right...
I... I'm sorry... I'm sorry...
Shhh... Shhh... Shhh... I forgive you this time, honey...
Just keep your fucking mouth shut and I'll help you understand where's your place...
Please, sir... I don't want this... I wanna go home... I beg you... I beg you...
Goddamnit... So beautiful, but so annoying... Why don't you just shut the fuck up?
This is going to happen, honey... you should try to relax and enjoy...
